metadata.title: CVE-2024-26815 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/sched: taprio: proper TCA_TAPRIO_TC_ENTRY_INDEX checktaprio_parse_tc_entry() is not correctly checkingTCA_TAPRIO_TC_ENTRY_INDEX attribute:	int tc; // Signed value	tc = nla_get_u32(tb[TCA_TAPRIO_TC_ENTRY_INDEX]);	if (tc >= TC_QOPT_MAX_QUEUE) {		NL_SET_ERR_MSG_MOD(extack, "TC entry index out of range");		return -ERANGE;	}syzbot reported that it could fed arbitary negative values:UBSAN: shift-out-of-bounds in net/sched/sch_taprio.c:1722:18shift exponent -2147418108 is negativeCPU: 0 PID: 5066 Comm: syz-executor367 Not
